'''15w41b''' is the thirty-second [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on October 7, 2015<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20151007153111/https://www.mojang.com/2015/10/minecraft-snapshot-15w41a/</ref> to fix a crash that affected some users on launch.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=15w41b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|856|Stepping sound loops when 2 or more players are standing on the same block.
|16435|Boats still break on lily pads.
|59261|Villagers with some blocks in head slot either display incorrectly or are not able to be placed.
|65421|Open Lan unlock difficulty world if is locked.
|66557|Boat velocity changes in 14w32b.
|;dev
|86166|No bow animation on Multiplayer.
|89894|Mobs riding slimes causes the game to crash.
}}</onlyinclude>
